title: Desarrollo web en 2017
description: Let's talk about modern web development, Dos and don'ts

location.placeName: Ministerio de Tecnologías de la Información y las Comunicaciones de Colombia

title: Angular 1, 2, 3, 4, 5? It's just Angular
description: Confused about the new releases? Can't keep up with all the changes? Don't worry it really is JUST Angular

title: Progressive Web Apps (PWA)
description: Progressive Web Applications offer an app-like experience by providing content to the user even without an active internet connection. The user can "install" them on their mobile device's desktop and have things like a splash screen on loading, a themed native UI, no browser navigation bar (optional),receive push notifications, and so forth. All that using JavaScript.

title: Progressive Web Apps (PWA)

location.placeName: Cámara de Comercio de Bogotá - CCB

title: Offline applications with Service Worker
description: With a Service Worker we can make any app work offline, we just need to set it up, select the files to cache and pick a caching strategy. We'll create an app following those steps.

location.placeName: Universidad Inca Garcilaso de la Vega

location.placeName: Cámara de Comercio de Bogotá - CCB

title: Auto Scalable Applications
description: Modern apps should be able to handle requests from one user to thousands of users at a single time without breaking. You may need more processing power (servers) for a thousand users making requests, but just a little bit for 200 users, auto scaling makes it easier for you to handle all of your users requests and keeps it cheaper by using only what is needed.

location.placeName: Cámara de Comercio de Bogotá - CCB

location.placeName: Ministerio de Tecnologías de la Información y Comunicaciones - MINTIC

title: Angular 1.x - Components & Firebase
description: Angular 1.5 came with the concept of components where you can encapsulate logic even more easily, lets try them out using Angular Fire, the AngularJS interface for Firebase.

title: Firebase for web applications
description: Firebase allows us to create fast and performant applications that can store/read data in real time without setting up a server, just a couple of lines in our client. We'll explore the Firebase web SDKs and create a sample app.

title: Typescript introduction
description: Angular 2 is built on TypeScript, a superset of JavaScript. It includes several features available in ES6/ES2015 and some new cool things that we will use on a sample app.

title: Rapid Web Prototyping
description: During hackatons what matters the most is getting a Minimum Viable Product as soon as possible, taking advantage of the tools available out there (in the interwebs) will help you work smarter by providing you a boilerplate you can use right away, so you can focus on your idea/product.

title: Angular2 - a gentle introduction
description: Angular 2 is the new version of the popular framework we love. Sadly (?) for us, Angular 1.x devs, it changed everything. Almost all the things we used to know, love or hate are gone so we need to take a step back and start thinking about our app development using a different paradigm.

title: Angular2 a practical introduction
description: Angular 2 is the new version of the popular framework we love. Sadly (?) for us, Angular 1.x devs, it changed everything. Almost all the things we used to know, love or hate are gone so we need to take a step back and start thinking about our app development using a different paradigm.
